Oroko, nke a na-akpọkwa Bakundu-Balue ma ọ bụ Balundu-Bima, bụ ụyọkọ asụsụ Bantu a na-amaghị nke ọma nke a na'asụ na Cameroon.
Varieties are Kundu/Nkundu (Lokundu, Bakundu), Lue (Lolue, Balue), Mbonge, Ekombe, Londo (Londo ba Nanga; cf
Londo), Londo ba Diko, Ngolo (Longolo; cf
Ngolo dialect), Bima, Tanga (Lotanga, Batanga), na Koko (Lokoko, Bakoko: dị iche na asụsụ Bakoko)
Maho (2009) lere ndị a anya dị ka asụsụ iri dị iche iche.
